item.title: How to Install Waveshare 3.5" LCD on Ubuntu 20.04
item.description: Following the steps of an older post (Installing Kuman 3), I find myself trying to configure the same Waveshare 3.5” LCD touch screen on my Raspberry Pi 3B, but now with Ubuntu 20.04 64.bit. As usual the LCDs from Waveshare are not that easy to configure. While researching online I could not find any working instructions on how to configure the screen with Ubuntu 20.04. I found a few Git repos (Wavesahre and LCD Wiki), but they all failed to get me with a working config.
